Package PD

Class DiceBag

java.lang.Object
PD.DiceBag
public class DiceBag extends Object
DiceBag is a Class that represents a collection of Die that have the same number of faces.
Author:
(David Santos)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DiceBag()
    Instantiates a DiceBag with 1 Die that has 6 faces.
    DiceBag(int numFaces, int numDice)
    Instantiates a DiceBag with the specified number of Dice with a specific number of faces.

    toString()
    Combines the sum of the face values and each face value for each dice rolled in a string that will be returned.

  • Constructor Details

    • DiceBag

      public DiceBag()
      Instantiates a DiceBag with 1 Die that has 6 faces.

    • DiceBag

      public DiceBag(int numFaces, int numDice) throws NumberOfFacesRangeException, NumberOfDiceRangeException
      Instantiates a DiceBag with the specified number of Dice with a specific number of faces.
      Parameters:
      numFaces - for the number of faces on the dice in the bag.
      numDice - for the number of dice in the bag.
      Throws:
      NumberOfDiceRangeException - - if the number of dice is not greater than 0.
      NumberOfFacesRangeException - - propagates from Dice.

    • getFaces

      public int getFaces()

    • getNumDice

      public int getNumDice()

    • rollBag

      public int rollBag()
      Rolls each Die in the bag and returns a random value based on the number of faces, and adds it to the result.
      Returns:
      int result of the sum of each face rolled on each Die.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Combines the sum of the face values and each face value for each dice rolled in a string that will be returned.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String of the result and faces of Die.
